author: leny8237
content: Hello, is the Protocol Wiki Contributors call happening now ?

author: kboom_ro
content:
Hello <@&857649635274915900>, <@&1126618846711795912> !
I wrote this Hackmd post (https://hackmd.io/@kboomro/rk7RTSbxgx) part of my "Post-EPF Grant - eODS specs" grant, with the aim to engage the Ethereum community in discussions about the prospect of having delegation enshrined in the protocol. 
TL;DR
- I analyse what works and what are the current challenges in existing models of delegations in other PoS blockchains and off-protocol Ethereum
- I present a possible delegation model in the proposed eODS feature, outlining its logic, structure, and short-term implementation pathway (model surrendering included)
- I envision medium - term / long - term implementation steps for designing, testing and possibly adopting enhanced delegation at protocol level

Reviews welcomed!ðŸ«¡ 
eODS specs and tests are work in progress
